Summary Note:

Josefine Beatrix Koller is a seasoned professional with over 23 years of experience.

Education Background:
In 1997, Josefine finished her secondary school education at Privatgymnasium der Dominikanerinnen.
Josefine attended FH Upper Austria University of Applied Sciences and graduated in 2002.
Occupation History:
Josefine Beatrix Koller is a seasoned professional with over 23 years of experience.
Josefine Beatrix Koller began her professional journey as a Plant Manager at Schoeller-Bleckmann AG in 2002, laying the foundation for future success.
At Schoeller-Bleckmann AG, she held the position of Operations Director from 2004 to 2006, making significant contributions to the organization.
She spent 3 years working as a CEO at AT&S Austria Technologie & Systemtechnik AG, refining her expertise and building a strong network.
After 9 years of dedication, she assumed the role of Chairman at Palfinger AG in 2012, spearheading high-profile projects and mentoring junior colleagues.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 650000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
She owns 2 exceptional properties: condo located in Vienna, valued at approximately 800,000.00 EUR, villa located in Traun, valued at approximately 1,970,000.00 EUR. This impressive collection showcases her flair for luxury living and investment prowess, with a notable presence in Traun and Vienna.

In addition to her career success, she also received an inheritance of 1920000 EUR from her late grandfather, a renowned Tech Entrepreneur, in 2007.
Client Summary: In summary, Josefine has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
